offer.title: Service Your Way
offer.disclaimer: Valid only at Concord Honda. Maximum discount $150. Please present coupon when service order is written. Taxes and hazardous waste disposal fees extra. Tires are excluded. Not valid in conjunction with other coupons or discounts (oil change, drains or refill services). Other restrictions may apply.  Limit one coupon per VIN #.  Honda models only. See your service professional for details.
